text: Gina [ jee-nuh ] is a female name with Italian origin. Gina is a well-liked name for newborn girls with a fascinating history and significance. This name originated from Italy and is a diminutive form of Regina, which translates to "queen" in Latin. Additionally, Gina is a truncation of Georgina, which means "farmer" in Greek. This name is very popular for girls in several countries. The name is shorthand for the name Regina. Celebrities with the name include Gina Gershon and Gina Lollobrigida. == People == * Gina Gershon, American actress * Gina Lollobrigida, Italian actress, photojournalist, and politician * Gina Obedapo Iyashere, British comedian * Gina Haspel, American intelligence officer ==References== Category:Given names
title: Gina
